io.dapr.examples.actors.http

Class DemoActorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dapr.actors.runtime.AbstractActor
      • io.dapr.examples.actors.http.DemoActorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Remindable<Integer>, DemoActor

    @ActorType(name="DemoActor")
public class DemoActorImpl
extends AbstractActor
implements DemoActor, Remindable<Integer>
    Implementation of the DemoActor for the server side.

      • incrementAndGet

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Integer> incrementAndGet(int delta)
        Increments a persistent counter, saves and returns its updated value. Example of method implemented with Reactor's Mono class. This method could be rewritten with blocking calls in Mono, using block() method:

        public int incrementAndGet(int delta) { int counter = 0; if (super.getActorStateManager().contains("counter").block()) { counter = super.getActorStateManager().get("counter", int.class).block(); } counter = counter + 1; super.getActorStateManager().set("counter", counter).block(); return counter; }

        Specified by:
        incrementAndGet in interface DemoActor
        Parameters:
        delta - Amount to be added to counter.
        Returns:
        Mono response for the incremented value.

        Specified by:
